newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: ASR (Stad R'dam) sees strong H2 rise.
newsitem.headline: ASR (Stad R'dam) sees strong H2 rise.

text.p: Insurance firm ASR Verzekeringsgroep NV said on Tuesday it expected a strong rise in profits in the second half of the year.
Earlier, ASR reported first-half 1997 net profits of 86.5 million guilders versus 62.2 million guilders in the same period of 1996.
ASR Verzekeringsgroep, previously called Stad Rotterdam Anno 1720 NV, formed a new holding company earlier this year when it acquired unlisted De Amersfoortse.

"Barring unforeseen circumstances, ASR expects the percentage rise in both net profit and earnings per share for 1997 as a whole to be of the same order of magnitude as the first half," it said in a statement.
Net earnings rose by 39.1 percent during the first six months of 1997 compared to the same period a year earlier.
